Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
hey, how are you? How can i get my account verification?

Hey there! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. To get your account verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once we receive this information, we'll conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. Let me know if you need any more help!
Great! Once our team reviews your information, they'll update you on your account status. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
who is my API Acess Token?

To obtain your API Access Token, you'll need to submit a request by clicking 'Help' on the left-hand side of your screen or by contacting adsupport@newsbreak.com. Make sure to include your Organization ID in the request. If you need more details, you can check out our API Integration Guide here: [API Integration Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide).
